vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to pierce, thrust through, pierce through
1a) (Qal) to pierce, run through
1b) (Niphal) to be pierced through
1c) (Pual) pierced, riddled (participle)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   agujerear, punzar; (b) nif.   ser atravesado; (c) pu.   ser atravesado
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 刺, 戳入, 刺穿
1a) (Qal) 刺, 通過
1b) (Niphal) 被刺穿
1c) (Pual) 刺穿, 穿洞 (分詞)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 刺, 戳入, 刺穿
1a) (Qal) 刺, 通过
1b) (Niphal) 被刺穿
1c) (Pual) 刺穿, 穿洞 (分词)
